channel.title: Downloaded the game.. How do i actually launch it?
channel.description:
So i just downloaded it. and headed towards "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\sourcemods\BMS". But there is not an icon which allows me to start the game up.
Im a total source noob, so could someone explain to me how to start the game?
EDIT: Game doesnt show up in the steam library also

item.title: Downloaded the game.. How do i actually launch it?
